sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Champaign Land Cession Act.

sections.heading: Jurisdiction over the following described lands in the County
sections.text:
of Champaign, State of Illinois, is hereby ceded to the United States of
America:

sections.heading: Over the North half (N 1/2) of the Southeast Quarter (SE 1/4)
sections.text:
of Section Twelve (12) Township Twenty-one (21) North, Range Nine (9)
East of the Third (3rd) Principal Meridian, containing Eighty (80) acres
more or less.
